catalog_info.title: Spanish for Latino Students
catalog_info.notes: TBD and members of the Department Spanish 49h was formerly Spanish 35; therefore, students cannot take 49h if they've already taken 35. Spanish 49h should be a prerequisite for 59h (or permission of the instructor).
catalog_info.description: Designed for Latino students, this course builds on students' previous knowledge of Spanish to expand and strengthen their oral and written interpersonal, interpretive and presentational communicative skills. Spanish grammar is reviewed using a functional approach to highlight differences found in informal and academic contexts. Students explore the topics of language, cultures and identity in the U.S and in the Spanish-speaking world , using a variety of texts and genres, music, videos, films and visual arts.
